page.title: 12KILBURN(DERBY)AREA EMPLOYM'T
page.content: The majority of those with employment travel beyond our area to their place of work. Although certain firms draw substancial numbers of workers from our area, there is a wide range of workplaces and job types. Thorntons and Glow_Worm, for instance, draw in many workers to Belper, yet the town provides work for only about an eigth of the areas workforce. The diversity of work_types contrasts with the dominance of the coal_extracting in earlier generations. Unemployment is a major social concern, although the areas rate is close to the national average. All that remains now is the coal washing plant bedide the A.61 and the old spoil heaps which are gradually being reclaimed for farming.
